system.effect: Pok√©mon of at least Level 20 with this Capability can produce a mushroom item once a day as an Extended Action. Roll 1d20 when this Capability is used. On a roll of 1-12, a Tiny Mushroom is produced. On a roll of 13-18, a Big Mushroom is produced. On a roll of 19-20, a Balm Mushroom is produced.
